entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as reacting to a noise by screwing up his eyes and clapping his hands over his ears.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as darting forward with Mrs. Weasley to try to close the curtains.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as trying to close the curtains and later stunning other portraits with her wand.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks apologizes over and over again while dragging a troll's leg back off the floor.

entities.name: the old woman
entities.description: The old woman is described as screeching loudly and trying to tear at people's faces with her clawed hands.

entities.name: the man with long black hair
entities.description: A man with long black hair comes charging out of a door facing Harry and roars at the old woman to shut up.

entities.name: the troll
entities.description: The troll is mentioned as being dragged back off the floor by Tonks.

relationships.description: Tonks is dragging the troll's leg back off the floor.
Mrs. Weasley tried to close the curtains over the old woman.
Lupin is mentioned as trying to close the curtains with Mrs. Weasley.
Mrs. Weasley stunned other portraits in the hall with her wand.

relationships.entity_1: the man with long black hair
relationships.description: The man with long black hair roars at the old woman to shut up.
Tonks apologized over and over again while dragging a troll's leg back off the floor, near Harry.
